Terrorsaur/Rowdy Wolf:





Terrorsaur weived from the the missile, and took aim on Ultracon. But 
when he prepared himself to fire. He saw Rowdy Wolf below.

"Oh slag!" he said. "He's still around!" He backed off, fast. He flew 
towards the cave.



Rowdy Wolf leaped away from Dinotron's optic lazers. He turned his 
body to the Dinobot. "It's a waste. You are just the same as your 
enemies, yet you are too foolish to know so. This has been witnessed 
by the Vok before." He closed his yellow optics a few moments, then 
opened them again. "If you wish to die, let us aid you!" He raised a 
hand to the sky and wavered it around. 

Dark clouds rolled in, thunder murmuring inside. Water decended from 
the darkened clouds, onto the earth and the battling robots. Rowdy 
Wolf transformed to beast mode and bolted away.



Terrorsaur turned and watched as the clouds rolled in unannoucned. 
Water dropped down from them, but when they fell down on him, it 
burned. He screeched and looked down where the water droplets hit his 
shoulders and arms. He held his head with one hand. He noticed the 
spots where the water was landing on him, it was melting off his 
metalwork.

"Oh slag, it's acid!" he shouted. He turned and flew quickly into the 
Predacon cave. "Let me in! Let me in!" He screamed.
